member.name: T:Plugin.InAppAd.Abstractions.InAppAdView
member.summary: This control for advertising in mobile apps

member.name: P:Plugin.InAppAd.Abstractions.InAppAdView.AdUnitId
member.summary: The ID of the AdMob ad to display This is the string Id from your Google Play account AdUnitId example : ca-app-pub-5796681800623607/8623940979

member.name: P:Plugin.InAppAd.Abstractions.InAppAdView.MicrosoftAppId
member.summary: The ID of the Microsoft ad to display This is the string Id from https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/uwp/monetize/install-the-microsoft-advertising-libraries
